extensionDescription.message: Collect and copy specific links from web pages using various filters

selectFilterInstruction.message: Please select a filter type below:
selectFilterInstruction.description: Instruction text for selecting filter type

filterByDomain.description: Option to filter links by domain

filterByText.description: Option to filter links by text content

filterByUrl.description: Option to filter links by URL pattern

filterByRegex.description: Option to filter links by regex

placeholderUrl.description: Placeholder text for URL pattern filter

selectFilterFirst.description: Placeholder text when no filter type is selected

scanLinks.description: Button text to scan for links

copySelected.description: Button text to copy selected links

copyAll.description: Button text to copy all links

clearResults.description: Button text to clear the results list

linksFound.description: Status message showing number of links found

noLinksFound.description: Status message when no links are found

selectLinks.description: Error message when no links are selected

linksCopied.description: Success message showing number of links copied

allLinksCopied.description: Success message when all links are copied

noLinksToaCopy.description: Error message when there are no links to copy

copyFailed.description: Error message when copy operation fails

invalidRegexError.description: Error message when regex pattern is invalid
